Boulders.Name: Boulder 1
Boulders.Description: This is the obvious large boulder.

Boulders.Name: Slant Rock
Boulders.Description: This boulder is a few yards to the southeast of Boulder 1 and has a low angle west face.

Boulders.Name: Pump Rock
Boulders.Description: This boulder lies just north of Boulder 1 and has a traverse around its lip

Boulders.Name: Crank Queenie Boulder
Boulders.Description: This boulder is adjacent to the north of Pump Boulder and has a very overhanging north face through the cave.
